p: In all probiotic yogurts containing FAEE and FAEO, the WAC of the protein increased compared to the control treatment ( p < .05). The addition of FAEE compared to FAEO significantly increased the WAC of protein in probiotic yogurts ( p < .05). The highest protein WAC was measured in probiotic yogurts containing 0.4% of the extract (4.66 ± 0.80).
